title: Crate split: tak-core library + thin tak-cli wrapper
description: Refactor tak into a multi-crate workspace where `tak-core` owns domain, storage, lifecycle, and command execution logic while `tak-cli` becomes a thin CLI adapter focused on argument parsing, output selection, and process exit semantics.

contract.objective: Modularize tak into reusable crates without changing user-visible behavior, with tak-cli delegating command execution to tak-core.
acceptance_criteria: Workspace includes `tak-core` (library crate) and `tak-cli` (binary crate) with documented module ownership boundaries.
All command execution paths used by `tak-cli` flow through stable `tak-core` APIs rather than direct command-module coupling.
Behavior/output parity is preserved for existing command surfaces via regression coverage.
Architecture and migration docs explain crate boundaries and contributor workflow.
